title: Dark Unicorn
description: After a major breakup with her ex-boyfriend, Amy takes a spur of the moment trip to Finland! On her surprise Nordic vacation, Amy goes kayaking through the labyrinth of lakes and discovers a beast she never knew existed! A Dark Unicorn! Something about this creature brings out her wildest and darkest fantasies which he wants to make a reality! This is a 3,500 word hardcore erotic novel. It includes rough sex, anal, oral, horn sex, cream pies and more!
author: Whitney Fox
